1.query: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', Orders.OrderDate) AS Month, SUM(OrderDetails.Quantity * Products.Price) AS Revenue FROM Orders JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.OrderID = OrderDetails.OrderID JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.ProductID = Products.ProductID GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month;
1.title: Monthly Revenue Trend (July 1996 - February 1997)

2.query: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', OrderDate) AS Month, COUNT(OrderID) AS Number_of_Orders FROM Orders GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month  LIMIT 10;
2.title: Number of Orders Per Month (July 1996 - February 1997)

3.query: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', Orders.OrderDate) AS Month, COUNT(Orders.OrderID) AS Number_of_Orders, SUM(OrderDetails.Quantity * Products.Price) AS Revenue FROM Orders JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.OrderID = OrderDetails.OrderID JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.ProductID = Products.ProductID GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month  LIMIT 10;
